// ONTEL

Introduction

Ontel Mobile Trading LLC was established in 2013 & Ontel Trading FZE was established in  2018  Dubai U.A.E With maintaining the legacy for almost a decade.

Ontel Mobile has become the best provider of leading brand’s products in the U.A.E. It deals in Apple products & Samsung along with its services. Ontel Mobile Trading LLC & Ontel Trading FZE is one of the renowned company in DUBAI UAE.  Ontel Mobile believes in providing the best of its services by keeping its customer satisfaction as a prior element in Dubai, U.A.E.

Our Mission

Our Philosophy

Our Vision

Our Strategy
// why choose us

We are the Importer & Exporter
We only deal in Bulk Quantity

We sell Quality & Branded products only. We also ensure that the Products are  Factory Sealed. We already sold out Millions of goods and our Company is more trustworthy for Customers caring.

Ontel Mobile is one of the prominent and trusted names in the field of Mobile Phones for electronic devices. We have a wide range of products in electronics & gaming consoles. All the product sold through our website is genuine.You will enjoy the experience of shopping with us, guaranteed. And your joy makes us bring more exciting and innovative products to you that would update and upgrade your lifestyle We look forward to you shopping with us over and over again.

Do stay connected with us to know about our special offers,  Have a great time shopping with us…

// ONTEL

FAQ's

If the phone is locked then what should we do?

We can replace it with the same condition that we received from the customer.

How to claim the warranty can we go to Ontel Mobile?

NO ! you should go directly to Apple Store.

If my phone is locked and I throw my box what I do?

As Ontel Policy that it takes time for replacement, we will replace it with another handset.

How long time will it takes when we claim the phone from Ontel Mobile?

It takes a minimum of 7 days or maximum 20 days

How much time will it take if the replacement unit is not available?

It takes a maximum of 10 days otherwise Ontel Mobile has the right to replace with other colors.

If the phone is locked do I get a refund?

NO! we can replace it. We don't refund money.

How to check our Phone Warranty?

Please visit:  https://checkcoverage.apple.com/us/en/
